dummy.help: prefixed with _ like _decoration will be ignored, and without it will be considered even if commented as this will read thru grep. Comments with HELPGOOD will be considered.

decoration.name: bombshelter_02
decoration.helpAddSpecialPOI: oasis note hint. teleport is on the ground above, this prefab will be placed further underground than vanilla, teleport -3131 37 -3131
